name: Fly Project: Into the Space
description:
You were given a simple task - to get to the center of the galaxy... 

But everything turned out to be much more complicated. Before the flight, you were injected with an experimental serum, and now you cannot die without reaching the goal. Just before you die, you blink and return to the moment of departure. You can't die and remember every attempt, but will it help you get to your goal?

Please, download it from Play Market if you can.

NEW VERSION ON PLAY MARKET
